table.mysql:
CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.gmap}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', `creation_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `creation_user` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `description` varchar(255) default NULL, `lang` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `maplatlong` varchar(255) default NULL, `mapzoom` int(11) default NULL, `markerlatlong` varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.gmap}` ,add column `maplatlong` varchar(255) default NULL after `lang`; ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.gmap}` ,add column `mapzoom` int(11) default NULL after `maplatlong`; ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.gmap}` ,add column `markerlatlong` varchar(255) default NULL after `mapzoom`;

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.gmap_details}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `mapid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', `creation_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `creation_user` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `description` varchar(255) default NULL, `lang` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `markerlatlong` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
